applications

Class ApplicationVersionService

  • java.lang.Object
    • applications.ApplicationVersionService

  • public class ApplicationVersionService
extends java.lang.Object
    Handles the update of all applications version number.
    Author:
    Thomas Debouverie

    • Method Detail

      • updateVersionNumberForProperty

        public static void updateVersionNumberForProperty(java.lang.String versionNumber,
                                                  Settings.PropertyId property)
        Tries to update in file the version number linked to given property. If it fails, it will display an appropriate dialog, then exit the application.
        Parameters:
        versionNumber - The version number to set
        property - The property ID for the application's version number
